transcript.text: Gifts and entertainment are often a key part of doing business. In this module, learn what you need to do to comply with our policies and the law when giving or accepting gifts and entertainment.

panelText.text: Exchanging gifts or entertainment can help build business relationships, but it can also create problems if not handled properly.
Follow our guidelines to avoid misusing gifts or entertainment.
Recognize that stricter rules apply to gifts or entertainment for government officials.
